issue.title: [R] summarize() should not eagerly evaluate
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-13740](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-13740). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
This will entail some refactoring and new features:

- collect() uses ExecPlan
- arrange uses an OrderByNode
- .data inside of arrow_dplyr_query can itself be arrow_dplyr_query
